dcterms:creator: H. Idrees
A. R. Zamir
Y.-G. Jiang
A. Gorban
I. Laptev
R. Sukthankar
M. Shah
dcterms:description: A dataset widely used to evaluate the performance of weakly supervised temporal action localization methods, containing untrimmed videos with frame-level annotations for 20 action categories.
dcterms:title: THUMOS14

dcterms:creator: F. Caba Heilbron
V. Escorcia
B. Ghanem
J. Carlos Niebles
dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset for temporal action localization tasks, consisting of 10,024 videos for training, 4,926 for validation, and 5,044 for testing, covering 200 complex human action classes.
dcterms:title: ActivityNet1.3

dcterms:creator: Y. Liu
L. Wang
Y. Wang
X. Ma
Y. Qiao
dcterms:description: A fine-grained video dataset for temporal action localization, combining three existing datasets and providing a three-level tagging hierarchy from coarse to fine.
dcterms:title: FineAction
